DOC.brief_summary: Study of Oxidative Stress Markers in order to assess whether there are differences between standard laparoscopic cholecystectomy vs single port cholecystectomy for uncomplicated cholelithiasis
DOC.brief_title: Oxidative Stress in Standard Laparoscopic vs Single Port Cholecystectomy
DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated cholelithiasis American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) I or II No previous operations in upper abdomen Body mass index (BMI) Cholecystitis ASA > II BMI>30 Previous operations in upper abdomen Previous operations in intestine Smokers Alcohol Drugs
